# down

**Instance Property**

The input object that represents the down button on the directional pad.

## Declaration

```swift
var down: any GCLinearInput & GCPressedStateInput { get }
```

## Directional buttons

- **left**: The input object that represents the left button on the directional pad.
- **right**: The input object that represents the right button on the directional pad.
- **up**: The input object that represents the up button on the directional pad.
